story.book.controller

Class StoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.controller.StoryController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalStoryController, OnlineStoryController

    public abstract class StoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    StoryController abstract for getting Story objects, lists of stories and saving stories.
    Author:
    Alex

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void changeLocalSID(int oldSID, int newSID)
      Changes the SID of a locally stored Story to a new SID.
      protected void clearViewedStory()
      Clears the folder of the previous story that was being viewed online.
      abstract void getStory(int SID)
      Sets the current Story of the StoryApplication.
      abstract java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryList()
      Gets an ArrayList of StoryInfo to be displayed to the user.

    • Method Detail

      • getStory

        public abstract void getStory(int SID)
        Sets the current Story of the StoryApplication.
        Parameters:
        SID - the SID of the Story to set

      • getStoryList

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryList()
        Gets an ArrayList of StoryInfo to be displayed to the user.
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of StoryInfo objects from a source

      • saveStory

        public abstract void saveStory()
        Save the Application current Story to a destination.

      • clearViewedStory

        protected void clearViewedStory()
        Clears the folder of the previous story that was being viewed online.

      • changeLocalSID

        protected void changeLocalSID(int oldSID,
                  int newSID)
        Changes the SID of a locally stored Story to a new SID. The old Story is deleted from storage and replaced by the same Story but with a new SID.
        Parameters:
        oldSID - the SID of the Story to change
        newSID - the new SID the Story will be assigned
